faq.question: What is the Olympia Bar League?
faq.answer: The OlyBars League (OBL) is a community of nightlife enthusiasts in Olympia, WA. Members earn points by checking in to local bars, participating in events like Karaoke and Trivia, and helping others find the 'Pulse' of the city.

faq.question: How do I earn points?
faq.answer: You earn 10 points for every 'Clock In' (once per venue per 12 hours), 10 points for uploading a 'Vibe Photo', and 5 points for sharing a deal. Bonus points are often available during special League events!

faq.question: What can I do with points?
faq.answer: Points determine your rank on the OlyBars Leaderboard. At the end of each season (Dec 31 and June 30), the top-ranked members win exclusive prizes, including 'Well 80' gift cards and rare OlyBars merch.

faq.question: What is the 'Pulse'?
faq.answer: The Pulse is our real-time vibe-meter. 'Chill' means quiet, 'Lively' means there is a good crowd, and 'Buzzing' means the place is hopping!

faq.question: How do I join a venue as an owner?
faq.answer: If you own a bar in Olympia and want to join the Pulse, use the 'Venue Admin Login' in the main menu or contact us at owners@olybars.com.

faq.question: Is Artie a real person?
faq.answer: Artie is OlyBars' AI concierge, powered by the spirit of the Artesian Well and Well 80 Brewhouse. He's here 24/7 to help you find the best well drinks and vibes in town.
